attributes.background:
Paper straws are flimsy and disintegrate before you've even finished your drink. They also taste like licking a newspaper.

Plastic straws aren't a problem if we don't throw them in the sea.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you could start a new petition calling on the Government to withdraw its proposal to ban plastic straws if that is something you would like to see happen.
